# Sahan Pramuditha

Personal portfolio website for Sahan Pramuditha, a software engineer and creative web developer.

Primary URL: https://www.sahanpramuditha.me/
Sitemap: https://www.sahanpramuditha.me/sitemap.xml
Robots: https://www.sahanpramuditha.me/robots.txt
Resume: https://www.sahanpramuditha.me/resume.pdf

Key sections:
- Home: https://www.sahanpramuditha.me/#home
- About: https://www.sahanpramuditha.me/#about
- Experience: https://www.sahanpramuditha.me/#experience
- Skills: https://www.sahanpramuditha.me/#skills
- Projects: https://www.sahanpramuditha.me/#projects
- Certifications: https://www.sahanpramuditha.me/#certifications
- Testimonials: https://www.sahanpramuditha.me/#testimonials
